rulings.text: A creature spell that doesn't have flying won't cost less even if an effect will cause the creature to have flying once on the battlefield. The last ability of Warden of Evos Isle can't reduce the colored mana requirement of a creature spell with flying.

mainBoard.name: Dungeon Geists
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
When Dungeon Geists enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as you control Dungeon Geists.

rulings.text: The ability can target a tapped creature. If the targeted creature is already tapped when it resolves, that creature just remains tapped and doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step.

Dungeon Geists’s triggered ability can target a tapped creature. If the targeted creature is already tapped when it resolves, that creature just remains tapped and won’t untap during its controller’s untap step.
If Dungeon Geists leaves the battlefield before its triggered ability has resolved, the target creature will be tapped, but it will be able to untap as normal.
If another player gains control of Dungeon Geists, its effect expires. It won’t keep the creature from untapping anymore, even if you later regain control of Dungeon Geists.

mainBoard.text:
Flying
When Dungeon Geists enters, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as you control Dungeon Geists.

foreignData.flavorText: Quienes hacen enfadar a los dimir se topan con enemigos allá donde vayan.
foreignData.name: Manipulación masiva
foreignData.text: Gana el control de X criaturas y/o planeswalkers objetivo.

foreignData.flavorText: Ceux qui dupent les Dimir trouvent des ennemis à chaque tournant.
foreignData.name: Manipulation de masse
foreignData.text: Acquérez le contrôle de X cibles, créatures et/ou planeswalkers.

foreignData.flavorText: Chi ostacola i Dimir scopre di avere nemici ovunque si volti.
foreignData.name: Manipolazione di Massa
foreignData.text: Prendi il controllo di X creature e/o planeswalker bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: ディミーアに逆らう者はどちらを向いても敵に遭う。
foreignData.name: 集団強制
foreignData.text: クリーチャーやプレインズウォーカー合わせてＸ体を対象とし、それらのコントロールを得る。

foreignData.flavorText: 디미르를 적으로 돌리는 자들은 이내 사방에 적이 깔려 있다는 것을 알게 된다.
foreignData.name: 대량 조작
foreignData.text: 생물 및/또는 플레인즈워커 X개를 목표로 정한다. 그 목표들의 조종권을 얻는다.

foreignData.flavorText: Os que se opõem aos Dimir encontram inimigos para onde quer que se voltem.
foreignData.name: Manipulação em Massa
foreignData.text: Ganhe o controle de X criaturas e/ou planeswalkers alvo.

foreignData.flavorText: Те, кто встает на пути у Димиров, встречают врагов за каждым поворотом.
foreignData.name: Управление Массами
foreignData.text: Получите контроль над X целевыми существами и (или) planeswalker-ами.

foreignData.flavorText: 反抗底密尔的人会发现自己四面皆敌。
foreignData.name: 全面操弄
foreignData.text: 获得X个目标生物和／或鹏洛客的操控权。

foreignData.flavorText: 反抗底密爾的人會發現自己四面皆敵。
foreignData.name: 全面操弄
foreignData.text: 獲得X個目標生物和／或鵬洛客的操控權。

mainBoard.name: Mass Manipulation
mainBoard.originalText: Gain control of X target creatures and/or planeswalkers.

rulings.text: In a multiplayer game, if a player leaves the game, all cards that player owns leave as well, and any effects that give the player control of permanents immediately end.
The control-change effect of Mass Manipulation lasts indefinitely. It doesn’t wear off during the cleanup step.

mainBoard.text: Gain control of X target creatures and/or planeswalkers.
